subject: Soccer
United States Open Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls of M.L.S. and the Cosmos of the N.A.S.L. will play each other for the first time, in a fourth-round match of the U.S. Open Cup on June 14.
snippet: The Red Bulls of M.L.S. and the Cosmos of the N.A.S.L. will play each other for the first time, in a fourth-round match of the U.S. Open Cup on June 14.
